articles.author: Joshua Nelson
articles.title: Sanders on war powers resolution: Nothing could be 'dumber' than having Congress 'take over foreign policy'
articles.description: Following Speaker Nancy Pelosi announcing plans for the House to vote Thursday on a War Powers Resolution that aims to limit President Trump’s military action toward Iran, former White House press secretary Sarah Sanders on Thursday blasted the resolution.
articles.content: Following Speaker Nancy Pelosi announcing plans for the House to vote Thursday on a war powers resolution that aims to limit President Trump’s ability to conduct military action against Iran, former White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders took aim at Democr… [+1777 chars]

articles.title: Chris Wallace – Fox News Chief International Celebrity Resort Correspondent

articles.author: Adam Shaw
articles.title: US defends Soleimani killing as ‘self-defense’ ahead of tense UN meeting
articles.description: The Trump administration is defending the strike that killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani last week as self-defense, while warning it is prepared to take "additional actions" if needed -- ahead of what is expected to be a tense meeting of the U.N. Security C…
